description: User login (US-017) requires a tenant and user to exist, which are created during registration (US-001).
mitigation_plan: Schedule US-001 and US-017 in the same sprint to resolve dependency immediately.

description: Check-in (US-028) requires GPS data, which depends on the location permission handling flow (US-076).
mitigation_plan: Implement a placeholder permission handler for initial development, but schedule both stories for the same sprint.

description: The Supervisor's approval dashboard (US-037) is useless without attendance records to approve, which are created by the check-in feature (US-028).
